attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister claims that people just want him to do his job and that people want him to lead us through the tough economic times ahead. 

This belief does not, to my knowledge, have any evidence to back it up. The only way the Prime Minister can claim to have this mandate is to go to the country and to win it. 

We live in a democracy. Let us see democracy in action!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
